=== PCFair Kuala Lumpur ===
''' 11th - 13th August 2006'''

Able to distribute to the public over 400cds.  Received positive feedback.

-- '''''By Ezwan Aizat Bin Abdullah Faiz''''' <<BR>> <<BR>>

=== 150+ Ubuntu 6.06 LTS CDs for IIUM ===
'''11 August 2006'''

I have sent over 150+ Ubuntu 6.06 LTS to <nowiki>[[http://www.iiu.edu.my|International Islamic University Malaysia]]</nowiki> (IIUM) for the Department of Information & Communication Technology to be used in their labs. IIUM's Matriculation Center in PJ have 5 computer labs with 30 computers in each lab. So, each lab will be allocated with 30 CD for the students who want to use Ubuntu.

-- '''''By Nicholas Ng''''' <<BR>> <<BR>>

=== KCBA ICT Expo (Kuching, Sarawak) ===
'''30 June - 2 July 2006'''

We also successfully distributed out 600 Ubuntu Dapper Drake CDs plus almost 200 older version of Ubuntu. We also receive good feedbacks from the visitors and some of them are interested to use it. For more information about this event, please visit the <nowiki>[[http://www.kuchingosc.org/activities/kuchingosc-at-kcba-ict-expo-2006/|activity page]]</nowiki> at <nowiki>[[http://www.kuchingosc.org/|Kuching Open Source Community]]</nowiki> website.
